questions.text: Which one of the following statements is true for excitatory postsynaptic potentials (EPSP) –

options.label: C
options.text: Are proportional to the amount of transmitter released by the presynaptic neuron

questions.correct_answer: C. Are proportional to the amount of transmitter released by the presynaptic neuron

questions.text: The intrafusal fibres of the striated skeletal muscles are innervated by one of the following type of motor neurons, Choose the correct answer:
Weber Fechner Law is –

options.label: A
options.text: Magnitude of stimulus strength perceived is approximately proportionate to the log of the intensity of stimulus strength

options.label: B
options.text: Magnitude of stimulus strength perceived is directly proportional to the intensity of stimulus strength

options.label: C
options.text: Threshold of receptor is directly proportional to stimulus strength

options.label: D
options.text: Threshold of receptor is inversely proportional to stimulus strength

questions.correct_answer: A. Magnitude of stimulus strength perceived is approximately proportionate to the log of the intensity of stimulus strength

Which of the following statements is true about presynaptic inhibition?

options.label: A
options.text: It results due to failure of the action potential to reach the synapse

options.label: B
options.text: It occurs due to hyperpolarisation of presynaptic membrane

options.label: C

options.label: D

questions.correct_answer: B. It occurs due to hyperpolarisation of presynaptic membrane
